continents.name: Hwayang
continents.description: A realm where the earth's crust bleeds molten fury. Dominated by the Eternal Pyre - a volcano that has burned since creation.

continents.name: Wolhwa
continents.description: A realm of eternal twilight where moonlight solidifies into silvered forests and liquid starlight flows through crystalline rivers.

continents.name: Cheolgeom
continents.description: Metallic steppes with ironwood forests, jagged canyon mines, and fortress-cities built into cliffs. Magnetic storms pull metal objects skyward; rivers run with liquid mercury.

continents.name: Chunmok
continents.description: Bioluminescent forests with sentient trees, floating lotus lakes, and valleys shrouded in venomous mist. Floating islands suspended by ancient magic and sacred groves guarded by druids.

continents.name: Binghe
continents.description: Vast frozen tundras lit by shimmering auroras, labyrinthine ice caverns, and fields of singing iceflowers. Glacial rivers flow with liquid ice, and Aurora Peaks harness northern lights for magic.

continents.name: Amgwang
continents.description: Desolate wastelands with bloodstone spires, bone-choked rivers, and crumbling ghost cities haunted by spirits. Shroud Mists induce hallucinations, and Necrotic Pits fuel undead armies.

continents.name: Bungu
continents.description: Floating islands suspended by levitation stones, connected by fragile crystal bridges. Stormy skies crackle with lightning, and tornadoes spiral between islands. Home to eternal storms and skywhales.

continents.name: Nongwon
continents.description: Endless rolling plains of golden wheat, terraced rice paddies, and orchards bursting with fruit. Home to magical crops and Silkwood Forests.

continents.name: Yongju
continents.description: Volcanic highlands with smoldering peaks, dragonbone spires, and lakes of liquid magma. Home to ancient draconic wards and the Ashen Wastes.

continents.name: Haeguk
continents.description: Vast coral reefs, abyssal trenches, and archipelagos battered by typhoons. Underwater cities glow with bioluminescence, and whirlpools guard sunken treasures.

continents.name: Pyeonji
continents.description: Fractured landmasses floating in chaotic gravity fields, interspersed with unstable rifts and debris from other continents. Home to gravity storms and rift-mutated hybrids.

beasts.name: Magma Colossus
beasts.description: A 50-foot-tall lava giant with a molten core. Wields a flaming obsidian maul.
weaknesses: Shatters if doused with Arctic Spring Water (rare ice-aligned item)
beasts.taming: Only the OmniSummoner can bind it by surviving its 'Trial of Flame.'

beasts.name: Inferno Wyrm
beasts.description: A flying serpent that breathes white-hot flames. Nests in volcano craters.
beasts.taming: Feed it a Dragonheart Gem (dropped by SSS+ dragons).

beasts.name: Blaze Hydra
beasts.description: Three-headed serpent; each head spews lava, venom, or ash.
strengths: Regrows heads unless all are severed simultaneously
beasts.taming: Untamable except by OmniSummoners using Soul Chains.

beasts.name: Obsidian Golem
beasts.description: A living fortress of black glass and magma. Guards volcanic mines.
beasts.taming: Insert a Magnetic Core (Cheolgeom tech) into its chest.

beasts.name: Ash Phoenix
beasts.description: A radiant bird reborn from ashes; its feathers cure burns.
beasts.taming: Wolseong priests perform a Phoenix Pact ritual.

beasts.name: Lava Serpent
beasts.description: Burrows through magma rivers; ambushes prey with lava geysers.
beasts.taming: Lure with Firebloom Nectar (Hwayang rare herb).

beasts.name: Emberclaw Tiger
beasts.description: A striped predator with flaming claws. Hunts in volcanic jungles.
beasts.taming: Offer a Charred Stag carcass.

beasts.name: Smoldering Basilisk
beasts.description: Petrifies foes with glowing eyes; body radiates heat.
beasts.taming: Untamable (attacks all humans on sight).

beasts.name: Cinder Wolf Pack
beasts.description: 6-8 wolves with smoldering fur; hunt in coordinated packs.
beasts.taming: Raise a pup with Fire-Resistant Milk.

beasts.name: Flamefang Bear
beasts.description: A bear with magma-coated fangs; hibernates in lava caves.
beasts.taming: Bribe with Magma Honey (harvested from fireblooms).

beasts.name: Pyre Hawk
beasts.description: A hawk that drops incendiary feathers. Scouts for larger predators.
beasts.taming: Use a Fireproof Whistle to mimic its calls.

beasts.name: Scorchling Imp
beasts.description: Mischievous, foot-tall imps that throw fireballs.
beasts.taming: Bribe with shiny gems.

beasts.name: Magma Crab
beasts.description: Armored crab that swims in lava; claws snap steel.
beasts.taming: Untamable (too aggressive).

beasts.name: Ignis Sprite
beasts.description: Tiny flame spirits that possess weapons.
beasts.taming: Capture in a Fire Crystal Vial.

beasts.name: Charhound
beasts.description: Dog-sized salamander; loyal if fed burnt meat.
beasts.taming: Common pet for Hwageom soldiers.

beasts.name: Smokescale Viper
beasts.description: Camouflages in ash; venom induces fever.
beasts.taming: Herbalists use Anti-Venom Charms.

beasts.name: Ember Rat
beasts.description: Glowing rats that chew through stone.
beasts.taming: Pest control; rarely kept as pets.

beasts.name: Ash Mite Swarm
beasts.description: Thousands of mites that strip flesh to bone.
beasts.taming: Impossible; exterminate with fire.

beasts.name: Scoria Beetle
beasts.description: Beetles that eat obsidian; shells used for armor.
beasts.taming: Farmers breed them for materials.

beasts.name: Heat Leech
beasts.description: Leeches that drain body heat; used in torture.
beasts.taming: Only Hwageom slavers use them.

beasts.name: Celestial Leviathan
beasts.description: Serpentine dragon with starry scales that swims through lakes like liquid light. Controls tides and dreams.
beasts.taming: Only the OmniSummoner can bind it via 'Trials of Reflection'

beasts.name: Eclipse Harbinger
beasts.description: Winged humanoid with halo of darkness/light. Commands healing and decay magic.
beasts.taming: Requires Dual Core Catalyst (moonstone + shadowgem fusion)

beasts.name: Moonlight Stalker
beasts.description: Panther-like predator with starry fur. Hunts by manipulating moonlight.
beasts.taming: Wolseong priests use Lunar Lures (moonstone bait)

beasts.name: Dreamweaver Moth
beasts.description: Giant moth with hypnotic wing patterns that trap victims in endless dreams.
beasts.taming: Feed Dreamroot Pollen; bonds with shamans

beasts.name: Starlight Kirin
beasts.description: Divine stag with crystalline antlers that purify corruption. Glows like constellations.
beasts.taming: Pure-hearted bonding under starlight

beasts.name: Gloom Wraith
beasts.description: Vengeful spirit formed from unfulfilled wishes. Drains hope from victims.
beasts.taming: Untamable (resolve unfinished business)

beasts.name: Silverfang Wolf
beasts.description: Pack leader with metallic fur; howls summon moonlight beams.
beasts.taming: Defeat in solo combat

beasts.name: Shadowbloom Spider
beasts.description: Giant spider camouflaged as flowers; webs induce nightmares.
beasts.taming: Myeongwol Bu use Nightshade Venom

beasts.name: Luminance Hawk
beasts.description: Radiant hawk firing light arrows. Wolseong military scout.
beasts.taming: Reward with Starlight Berries

beasts.name: Duskfang Tiger
beasts.description: Black-striped tiger merging with shadows. Twilight ambusher.
beasts.taming: Raise cubs in darkness

beasts.name: Moonscale Serpent
beasts.description: Aquatic hypnosis snake with reflective scales.
beasts.taming: Calm with Lunar Flutes

beasts.name: Nightbloom Bat
beasts.description: Plague-carrying bat swarm obscuring vision.
beasts.taming: Repel with Anti-Pest Incense

beasts.name: Aurora Fox
beasts.description: Color-shifting fox creating treasure mirages.
beasts.taming: Trap with Gem-Encrusted Cage

beasts.name: Shadebear Cub
beasts.description: Wall-phasing bear cub with dangerous curiosity.
beasts.taming: Bait with Shadowroot Honey

beasts.name: Luminous Rabbit
beasts.description: Glowing guide rabbit considered good omen.
beasts.taming: Befriend with carrots

beasts.name: Twilight Crow
beasts.description: Syndicate spy crow with mimicry skills.
beasts.taming: Train with Shadow Tokens

beasts.name: Moonlit Cicada
beasts.description: Tranquility-inducing singing insect.
beasts.taming: Caged by healers

beasts.name: Glowworm Swarm
beasts.description: Medical bioluminescent worms cleansing decay.
beasts.taming: Common hospital residents

beasts.name: Starfall Beetle
beasts.description: Meteoric beetles used in jewelry-making.
beasts.taming: Collected by jewelers

beasts.name: Flicker Moth
beasts.description: Tiny moths that follow light sources; used as living lanterns.
beasts.taming: Caught in Crystal Jars.

beasts.name: Ironclad Colossus
beasts.description: A 100-foot-tall walking fortress with revolving sawblade arms and a molten core.
beasts.taming: OmniSummoner must embed a Soulforge Anchor into its core.

beasts.name: Thunder Ram Legion
beasts.description: A herd of 50 rams with electrified horns; stampedes create lightning storms.
beasts.taming: Cheonmugun engineers use Insulated Lassoes.

beasts.name: Razorfin Hawk
beasts.description: A hawk with blade-like wings that shreds armor. Hunts in magnetic storms.
beasts.taming: Reward with Sky-Iron Shards; loyal to blacksmiths.

beasts.name: Forge Golem
beasts.description: A molten-metal humanoid that breathes white flames. Guards Cheonmugun forges.
beasts.taming: Insert a Cooling Core (Binghe artifact) into its chest.

beasts.name: Chainfang Hyena
beasts.description: Hyenas with spiked chains fused to their bodies. Drains victims into linked hivemind.
weaknesses: Decapitate the alpha to disrupt the hivemind
beasts.taming: Cheonmugun soldiers use Chainbreaker Serums.

beasts.name: Spikeback Rhino
beasts.description: Armored rhino with retractable back spikes; charges through walls.
beasts.taming: Lure with Ironroot Tubers (Cheolgeom delicacy).

beasts.name: Anvil Crab
beasts.description: Giant crab with anvil-shaped shell; hammers foes with claws.
weaknesses: Shell cracks if heated then cooled rapidly
beasts.taming: Untamable (attacks all except Cheonmugun smiths).

beasts.name: Gearspider
beasts.description: Mechanical spider that injects mercury venom. Webs are razor-wire traps.
beasts.taming: Jangseung Mulguk blacksmiths use Magnetic Gauntlets.

beasts.name: Boltsteed Stallion
beasts.description: Armored horse that gallops on lightning; used by Cheonmugun cavalry.
beasts.taming: Only bonds with riders who survive its Lightning Trial.

beasts.name: Ironmaw Wolf
beasts.description: Wolf with steel fangs and grinding jaw muscles. Hunts in ore mines.
beasts.taming: Feed Reinforced Meat (infused with sky-iron).

beasts.name: Quicksilver Serpent
beasts.description: Liquid mercury serpent; corrodes flesh on contact.
beasts.taming: Capture in a Mercury Flask (alchemists only).

beasts.name: Scrap Rat Swarm
beasts.description: Thousands of rats that eat metal; plague Cheonmugun cities.
beasts.taming: Impossible; exterminate with Sonic Cannons.

beasts.name: Ore Worm
beasts.description: Burrowing worm that digests metal ore; leaves tunnels.
weaknesses: Dies if removed from ore deposits
beasts.taming: Miners use Ore Bait to direct them.

beasts.name: Shieldback Tortoise
beasts.description: Tortoise with a spiked iron shell; retracts into a fortress.
beasts.taming: Cheonmugun uses them as mobile barricades.

beasts.name: Cogling
beasts.description: Foot-tall mechanical gremlins that sabotage machinery.
beasts.taming: Engineers reward them with Clockwork Treats.

beasts.name: Nailfoot Vulture
beasts.description: Vultures with nail-like talons; scavenge battlefields.
beasts.taming: Untamable (considered bad omens).

beasts.name: Wireweaver Ant
beasts.description: Ants that spin steel silk; build indestructible hives.
beasts.taming: Farmers smoke hives to collect silk.

beasts.name: Bolt Beetle
beasts.description: Beetles that store static electricity; used as batteries.
beasts.taming: Stored in Insulated Jars.

beasts.name: Rust Mite Swarm
beasts.description: Mites that corrode metal to dust; infest Cheonmugun armories.
beasts.taming: Untamable (pest).

beasts.name: Scrap Pigeon
beasts.description: Mechanical messenger birds used by Cheonmugun.
beasts.taming: Pre-programmed with Command Cogs.

beasts.name: World Tree Guardian
beasts.description: A 200-foot-tall treant with bark-like armor and roots that manipulate tectonic plates.
weaknesses: Dies if its core seed is burned
beasts.taming: OmniSummoner must survive its 'Trials of Balance' to earn its loyalty.

beasts.name: Lotus Leviathan
beasts.description: Serpentine creature with lotus-petal scales that drowns victims in its floating lake.
weaknesses: Uprooting its anchor lotus disables its magic
beasts.taming: Suryeon Bimu druids perform Aqua Pact rituals during monsoons.

beasts.name: Thorned Behemoth
beasts.description: Boar-like monster with vines for tusks and a body covered in poison thorns.
beasts.taming: Untamable except by OmniSummoners using Soulbind Thorns.

beasts.name: Venombloom Dryad
beasts.description: Humanoid plant with flowers that release neurotoxins. Controls swarms of insects.
beasts.taming: Dokbul Maul assassins use Antidote Charms to negotiate.

beasts.name: Mossclaw Grizzly
beasts.description: Bear fused with moss and fungi; spores explode on contact.
beasts.taming: Feed it Fertile Soil to gain temporary loyalty.

beasts.name: Glowroot Serpent
beasts.description: Serpent with bioluminescent scales that hypnotizes prey with light patterns.
beasts.taming: Suryeon Bimu druids use Solar Lenses to redirect its light.

beasts.name: Sporefang Spider
beasts.description: Giant spider with mushroom cap; releases paralyzing spores.
beasts.taming: Dokbul Maul assassins pacify it with Fungal Nectar.

beasts.name: Vineclaw Panther
beasts.description: Panther with vine-like claws that strangle prey. Merges with shadows at night.
weaknesses: Light magic forces it into visibility
beasts.taming: Untamable (attacks all except Suryeon Bimu druids).

beasts.name: Bloomfang Tiger
beasts.description: Tiger with flower-patterned fur; petals detach as razor-sharp projectiles.
beasts.taming: Reward with Sunwater (purified lake water).

beasts.name: Rootwraith
beasts.description: Vengeful forest spirit that possesses trees to attack.
strengths: Immortal unless its host tree is burned
beasts.taming: Resolve its grudge through Suryeon Bimu rituals.

beasts.name: Luminous Stag
beasts.description: Stag with antlers glowing like lanterns; guides lost travelers.
beasts.taming: Wolseong Wangguk priests befriend them with Starlight Berries.

beasts.name: Thornling Swarm
beasts.description: Thousands of thumb-sized beetles with thorny shells.
beasts.taming: Impossible; exterminate with fire.

beasts.name: Shadevine Cobra
beasts.description: Cobra that slithers through shadows; venom induces hallucinations.
weaknesses: Light magic forces it into the open
beasts.taming: Myeongwol Bu assassins use Shadow Serums to control it.

beasts.name: Dewspriteling
beasts.description: Tiny humanoid plant spirits that heal allies with morning dew.
beasts.taming: Capture in Dew Vials; loyal to healers.

beasts.name: Barkhide Boar
beasts.description: Boar with bark-like hide; charges through underbrush.
beasts.taming: Lure with Truffle Mushrooms.

beasts.name: Glowfly Colony
beasts.description: Bioluminescent flies that swarm around predators to disorient.
beasts.taming: Used as natural lanterns; no taming needed.

beasts.name: Pitcher Plant Lurker
beasts.description: Carnivorous plant that mimics flowers; dissolves prey in digestive acid.
beasts.taming: Untamable (mindless predator).

beasts.name: Silkvine Moth
beasts.description: Moths that spin silk stronger than steel; cultivated by weavers.
beasts.taming: Keep in Mulberry Groves.

beasts.name: Sporehopper
beasts.description: Grasshopper-like insects that spread fertile spores.
beasts.taming: Farmers attract them with Sugar Sap.

beasts.name: Leafspryte
beasts.description: Animated leaves that play pranks; cause minor cuts.
beasts.taming: Children trap them in Glass Jars.

beasts.name: Frost Titan
beasts.description: A 150-foot-tall humanoid glacier with aurora-like veins. Commands blizzards and shatters mountains.
beasts.taming: OmniSummoner must survive its 'Trials of Endurance' in a -100°C storm.

beasts.name: Aurora Leviathan
beasts.description: Serpentine whale that swims through auroras, emitting blinding light beams.
beasts.taming: Hyeolbang oracles perform Aurora Binding rituals during polar nights.

beasts.name: Blizzard Wyrm
beasts.description: Wingless dragon that rides blizzards, freezing victims with its breath.
beasts.taming: Untamable except by OmniSummoners using Frostfire Crystals.

beasts.name: Iceblood Golem
beasts.description: Golem with a core of eternal ice; fists cause avalanches.
beasts.taming: Hyeolbang engineers implant Thermal Cores to control it.

beasts.name: Frost Howler
beasts.description: Wolf-like pack hunters with fur like steel wool. Howls induce hypothermia.
beasts.taming: Raise pups with Frost-Resistant Milk.

beasts.name: Glacial Nymph
beasts.description: Humanoid spirits that freeze victims with a touch. Guard sacred ice mirrors.
beasts.taming: Resolve their sorrow through Hyeolbang quests.

beasts.name: Snowspire Owl
beasts.description: Giant owl with ice-feather projectiles. Sees through blizzards.
beasts.taming: Reward with Frost Mice (ice-aligned rodents).

beasts.name: Rimefang Bear
beasts.description: Polar bear with diamond-hard claws; hibernates in icebergs.
beasts.taming: Lure with Arctic Salmon.

beasts.name: Crystal Wasp Swarm
beasts.description: Wasps with crystalline stingers that inject freezing venom.
beasts.taming: Hyeolbang alchemists use Flameless Smoke.

beasts.name: Frostbite Spider
beasts.description: Spider with venom that freezes blood. Webs are icy traps.
beasts.taming: Dokbul Maul assassins use Antidote Charms.

beasts.name: Icebloom Fox
beasts.description: Fox with frostflower patterns; blooms iceflowers where it steps.
beasts.taming: Lure with Frost Pearls.

beasts.name: Avalanche Crab
beasts.description: Crab with glacier-shell armor; triggers avalanches with claws.
beasts.taming: Untamable (attacks all except Hyeolbang priests).

beasts.name: Shiverling
beasts.description: Tiny ice sprites that numb foes with frost kisses.
beasts.taming: Capture in Ice Lanterns.

beasts.name: Snowstrider Hare
beasts.description: Rabbit with snowshoe feet; evades predators effortlessly.
beasts.taming: Children befriend them with Frost Carrots.

beasts.name: Hoarfrost Moth
beasts.description: Moths that spread frost wherever they land.
beasts.taming: Used to refrigerate food.

beasts.name: Icicle Bat
beasts.description: Bats that drop sharp icicles. Roost in frozen caves.
beasts.taming: Untamable (considered pests).

beasts.name: Frostroot Worm
beasts.description: Burrowing worms that cultivate frost-resistant roots.
beasts.taming: Farmers guide them with Ice Melodies.

beasts.name: Glimmer Pike
beasts.description: Fish with bioluminescent scales; survives subzero waters.
beasts.taming: Kept in Ice Aquariums.

beasts.name: Snowdust Beetle
beasts.description: Beetles that excrete snow-like powder; used in rituals.
beasts.taming: Collected in Frost Jars.

beasts.name: Chillspryte
beasts.description: Playful spirit that creates minor frost patches.
beasts.taming: Children chase them for fun.

beasts.name: Dread Titan
beasts.description: A 200-foot-tall skeletal giant wielding a scythe of souls. Commands legions of wraiths.
weaknesses: Holy light severs its soul tether
beasts.taming: OmniSummoner must bind it using a Soul Anchor forged in Wolhwa’s moonlight.

beasts.name: Bone Hydra
beasts.description: A nine-headed hydra with venomous bone fangs; regrows two heads per kill.
weaknesses: Burn all heads simultaneously with holy fire
beasts.taming: Guryeokpa necromancers use Necrotic Collars to enslave it.

beasts.name: Void Reaper
beasts.description: A cloaked specter that harvests souls via touch; phases through walls.
beasts.taming: Untamable except by OmniSummoners wielding Soul Resonance.

beasts.name: Plaguebringer
beasts.description: A rotting dragon that spreads virulent plagues via spores.
beasts.taming: Dokbul Maul assassins inject Antidote Serums to subdue it.

beasts.name: Soulflame Wraith
beasts.description: A flaming ghost that incinerates souls; born from betrayed oaths.
beasts.taming: Resolve its grudge through Hyeolbang rituals.

beasts.name: Shadow Behemoth
beasts.description: A panther-like monster fused with darkness; consumes light to grow.
weaknesses: Forced into visibility by light magic
beasts.taming: Myeongwol Bu assassins use Umbral Chains.

beasts.name: Carrion Crow Swarm
beasts.description: Thousands of undead crows that strip flesh and spread decay.
beasts.taming: Impossible; exterminate with firestorms.

beasts.name: Bloodthorn Golem
beasts.description: A golem of thorny vines and bone; regenerates via blood sacrifice.
beasts.taming: Suryeon Bimu druids use Purification Rites.

beasts.name: Ghoul Pack
beasts.description: Feral, cannibalistic humanoids that hunt in packs.
beasts.taming: Guryeokpa necromancers control them with Necrotic Whistles.

beasts.name: Cursed Centipede
beasts.description: A 30-foot centipede with venomous bone legs. Burrows through graveyards.
weaknesses: Crush its head or freeze it
beasts.taming: Feed it Rotting Flesh laced with poison.

beasts.name: Shadehound
beasts.description: A dog-like predator that merges with shadows to stalk prey.
weaknesses: Light magic forces it to materialize
beasts.taming: Reward with Shadowsteak (meat cured in Shroud Mists).

beasts.name: Bone Serpent
beasts.description: A skeletal snake that burrows through graves; constricts with ribcage body.
beasts.taming: Untamable (mindless).

beasts.name: Wailing Banshee
beasts.description: A spirit whose scream ruptures eardrums and induces madness.
beasts.taming: Resolve its sorrow via quests.

beasts.name: Rotspider
beasts.description: Spider with necrotic venom; webs decay flesh on contact.
beasts.taming: Dokbul Maul uses Anti-Venom Charms.

beasts.name: Grave Rat Swarm
beasts.description: Diseased rats that rise from corpses; spread plagues.
beasts.taming: Untamable (pests).

beasts.name: Specter Bat
beasts.description: Bats possessed by lost souls; drain mana via bites.
beasts.taming: Capture in Soul Cages.

beasts.name: Blackroot Vine
beasts.description: Animated vines that strangle intruders; grow from cursed soil.
beasts.taming: Untamable (mindless).

beasts.name: Hauntling
beasts.description: A weak poltergeist that moves objects and whispers lies.
beasts.taming: Children dare each other to 'capture' them in jars.

beasts.name: Mire Leech
beasts.description: Leeches that infest cursed swamps; drain blood slowly.
beasts.taming: Used in dark alchemy.

beasts.name: Dusk Moth
beasts.description: Moths that absorb light; create pockets of darkness.
beasts.taming: Caught in Shadow Lanterns.

beasts.name: Storm Titan
beasts.description: A 500-foot-tall humanoid tempest with lightning for veins and hurricane eyes.
beasts.taming: OmniSummoner must survive its 'Trials of the Vortex' inside a tornado.

beasts.name: Sky Leviathan
beasts.description: Serpentine creature that swims through clouds, raining acid monsoons.
beasts.taming: Haneul Soguk sky mages use Monsoon Anchors during dry seasons.

beasts.name: Thunder Roc
beasts.description: Colossal bird with electrified feathers; wingspan blots out the sun.
beasts.taming: Untamable except by OmniSummoners using Stormbinders.

beasts.name: Cyclone Golem
beasts.description: Swirling vortex of rocks and wind; crushes islands into debris.
beasts.taming: Haneul engineers implant Calm Cores to stabilize it.

beasts.name: Zephyr Drake
beasts.description: Wingless dragon that rides jetstreams; bites supersonic.
beasts.taming: Feed it Skywhale Blubber (rare delicacy).

beasts.name: Cloud Kraken
beasts.description: Translucent squid-like beast that strangles airships with mist tentacles.
beasts.taming: Sky pirates lure it with Siren Flares.

beasts.name: Lightning Wisp Swarm
beasts.description: Thousands of ball lightning orbs that overload machinery.
beasts.taming: Haneul mages trap them in Storm Jars.

beasts.name: Gale Serpent
beasts.description: Snake with wings; slices foes with wind-blade fangs.
beasts.taming: Reward with Featherfruit (sky-plant).

beasts.name: Tempest Hawk
beasts.description: Hawk that fires lightning from its beak; scouts for storms.
beasts.taming: Sky Dominion rangers use Thunder Whistles.

beasts.name: Mist Panther
beasts.description: Panther that merges with fog; creates decoy clones.
beasts.taming: Myeongwol Bu assassins use Fog Lamps to corner it.

beasts.name: Skyray
beasts.description: Manta ray-like creature that glides on thermals; shocks prey with tail.
beasts.taming: Feed it Ionized Fish (charged by lightning).

beasts.name: Whirlwind Fox
beasts.description: Fox with tornado tails; sucks foes into vortices.
beasts.taming: Lure with Spiral Berries (sky-plant).

beasts.name: Hailbeetle
beasts.description: Beetle that fires hailstone projectiles; nests in storm clouds.
beasts.taming: Capture in Frost Nets (Binghe tech).

beasts.name: Glidewing Sparrow
beasts.description: Sparrows with 10-foot wingspans; carry messages between islands.
beasts.taming: Reward with Skyseed Crumbs.

beasts.name: Gust Snake
beasts.description: Wingless snake that rides wind currents; constricts mid-air.
beasts.taming: Sky fishermen use Wind Lures.

beasts.name: Cloudspider
beasts.description: Spiders that spin webs between floating islands; silk is priceless.
beasts.taming: Harvesters use Silk Gloves to collect webs.

beasts.name: Breezeling
beasts.description: Tiny wind sprites that play pranks; knock items off cliffs.
beasts.taming: Children chase them for fun.

beasts.name: Zephyr Moth
beasts.description: Moths that flutter in perfect wind patterns; predict weather.
beasts.taming: Sky sailors keep them as luck charms.

beasts.name: Driftbloom
beasts.description: Floating flowers that purify air; cultivated in sky gardens.
beasts.taming: Planted in Wind Pots.

beasts.name: Flutterfly
beasts.description: Glowing flies that light paths on dark islands.
beasts.taming: Caught in Lantern Jars.

beasts.name: Terra Titan
beasts.description: A 300-foot-tall humanoid of soil and roots; controls crop growth and earthquakes.
beasts.taming: OmniSummoner must bond with its Worldseed Core during harvest season.

beasts.name: Harvest Leviathan
beasts.description: Serpentine creature with cornstalk scales that floods fields to drown foes.
beasts.taming: Miju Hyang druids perform Raincall Rituals to appease it.

beasts.name: Quake Behemoth
beasts.description: Boar-like monster with tusks that split the earth; triggers fissures.
beasts.taming: Untamable except by OmniSummoners using Tremor Cuffs.

beasts.name: Amber Golem
beasts.description: Golem of petrified honey and gemstones; guards ancient granaries.
beasts.taming: Farmers pour Sacred Honey into its core.

beasts.name: Thorned Reaper
beasts.description: Sentient scarecrow with scythe hands; harvests souls during autumn.
beasts.taming: Resolve its curse via Nongwon folklore quests.

beasts.name: Grain Guardian
beasts.description: Animated wheat golem that patrols fields; strangles intruders with stalks.
beasts.taming: Farmers 'negotiate' by offering grain tributes.

beasts.name: Blight Rat Swarm
beasts.description: Thousands of rats that rot crops with a touch; spread famine.
beasts.taming: Impossible; exterminate with fire or cats.

beasts.name: Silkwood Dryad
beasts.description: Tree spirit with silkwood bark; entangles foes in threads.
beasts.taming: Suryeon Bimu druids sing Grove Hymns to calm it.

beasts.name: Honeyhorn Beetle
beasts.description: Giant beetle that produces healing honey; pollinates magical flowers.
beasts.taming: Reward with Nectar Blooms.

beasts.name: Terrahoof Stag
beasts.description: Stag with hooves that sprout flowers; stabilizes soil erosion.
weaknesses: Hunted for its antlers (ground into fertilizer)
beasts.taming: Lure with Mineral Salt Licks.

beasts.name: Mudpuppy
beasts.description: Amphibious salamander that cleans irrigation canals; eats pests.
beasts.taming: Feed it Mud Shrimp (found in paddies).

beasts.name: Thresher Fox
beasts.description: Fox with scythe-like tail; cuts grain stalks for fun.
beasts.taming: Bribe with Sunripe Melons.

beasts.name: Dew Sprite
beasts.description: Tiny water spirits that water crops at night; playful but shy.
beasts.taming: Farmers leave Clay Jugs as offerings.

beasts.name: Bramblehog
beasts.description: Hedgehog with thorny quills; rolls into boulders.
beasts.taming: Lure into traps with Sweetfruit.

beasts.name: Seedsparrow
beasts.description: Sparrows that plant seeds mid-flight; vital for reforestation.
beasts.taming: Scatter seeds to attract flocks.

beasts.name: Rootsnake
beasts.description: Burrowing snake that aerates soil; non-venomous.
beasts.taming: Farmers tolerate them as allies.

beasts.name: Blossom Mite
beasts.description: Tiny mites that prune plants; overpopulation causes blight.
beasts.taming: Untamable (managed, not tamed).

beasts.name: Claypaw Rabbit
beasts.description: Rabbits with clay-coated fur; dig burrows that enrich soil.
beasts.taming: Children keep them as pets.

beasts.name: Sunstalker
beasts.description: Sunflower-like plant that follows the sun; seeds boost stamina.
beasts.taming: Planted in Sunsoil Pots.

beasts.name: Glowgrub
beasts.description: Glowing larvae that compost waste; used in lanterns.
beasts.taming: Collected in Compost Jars.

beasts.name: Eclipse Serpent
beasts.description: A serpentine dragon with obsidian scales that shimmer with constellations. Dormant in the Ashen Spine, its awakening warps time during solar eclipses.
beasts.taming: OmniSummoner must outpace its time-loop via a Celestial Sundial artifact.

beasts.name: Magma Kraken
beasts.description: A tentacled leviathan dwelling in Yongju’s subterranean magma seas. Its beak crushes Dragonsteel.
weaknesses: Tentacles solidify if doused in Wolseong’s moon-tide water
beasts.taming: Haejeok pirates harpoon it using chains forged from Ignarion’s fangs.

beasts.name: Soulflare Wyrm
beasts.description: A translucent dragon born from the souls of broken Blood Oaths. Glides through solid rock to ambush clans.
beasts.taming: Yonghon Jeok trap it in a Soulforge Amulet, sacrificing their own memories.

beasts.name: Gravemaw Colossus
beasts.description: A hulking dragon with a black hole in its chest. Roams the Ashen Wastes, pulling entire villages into its maw.
strengths: Crushes foes with localized gravity wells
weaknesses: Reverse gravity spells destabilize its core
beasts.taming: Cheonmugun engineers use Rift Anchors to pin it mid-air.

beasts.name: Crystal Hydra
beasts.description: A seven-headed hydra with Ember Crystals growing from its necks. Each head embodies a dragon clan’s sin (greed, wrath, etc.).
strengths: Shattered heads regrow as crystalline spikes
weaknesses: All heads must be severed simultaneously with Dragonsteel blades
beasts.taming: Wolseong priests perform a Chorus of Atonement to pacify it.

beasts.name: Blazefang Chimera
beasts.description: A grotesque fusion of dragon, lion, and scorpion, stitched by Yonghon Jeok alchemists. Breathes radioactive fire.
weaknesses: Unstable core explodes if frozen then ignited
beasts.taming: Feed it a Chaos Core (harvested from rift mutants).

beasts.name: Voidshriek Harpy
beasts.description: A winged humanoid with a draconic tail and a mouthless face. Emits silence that erases spells.
weaknesses: Screams in agony when exposed to loud music
beasts.taming: Myeongwol Bu assassins use Soundstone Flutes to dominate it.

beasts.name: Bloodscale Leviathan
beasts.description: A crimson eel-dragon that swims through Yongju’s magma rivers, drinking Dragonblood to grow.
weaknesses: Dehydrates if lured into the Scaleless Wastes
beasts.taming: Ignis Clan tempts it with vials of their patriarch’s blood.

beasts.name: Blightspine Golem
beasts.description: Animated dragonbone infused with venomous algae from cursed lakes. Infects crops and water.
beasts.taming: Hyeolbang oracles bury it in salt mixed with volcanic ash.

beasts.name: Riftstalker Drake
beasts.description: A panther-like drake with rift-scarred hide. Phases in/out of reality to ambush prey.
weaknesses: Trapped in a stabilized rift bubble
beasts.taming: Nine Shadows Syndicate lures it with Rift Shard bait.

beasts.name: Frostspire Wyvern
beasts.description: A wyvern encased in cursed ice from the Frostscourge Drake’s lair. Freezes victims into macabre statues.
weaknesses: Shatters if its frozen heart is struck with a hammer
beasts.taming: Tempest Clan uses storm magic to blast it with hail.

beasts.name: Thunderclaw Roc
beasts.description: A giant bird with lightning-coated talons. Nests atop Dragonbone Spires, preying on storm wyrms.
weaknesses: Grounded by Umbra Clan’s shadow nets
beasts.taming: Cheonmugun cavalry joust it mid-air with insulated lances.

beasts.name: Emberghost Naga
beasts.description: Ethereal serpentine dragons haunting volcanic caves. Guard forgotten Dragonsteel vaults.
weaknesses: Bound to physical form by sprinkling Dragonblood
beasts.taming: Children offer charred poetry to appease them.

beasts.name: Obsidian Gargoyle
beasts.description: Winged statues carved by Drakonids to protect temples. Animated by shards of the Infernal Sovereign’s heart.
weaknesses: Command word etched on their tongues (known only to Yongin Sega)
beasts.taming: Recite the Oath of Stone in Draconic tongue.

beasts.name: Suncinder Manticore
beasts.description: A lion-dragon hybrid with a mane of solar flares. Created by Ignis Clan to rival the Emberclaw Phoenix.
beasts.taming: Feed it Sun Empire flags soaked in magma.

beasts.name: Ashveil Spider
beasts.description: A spider-dragon that weaves ash into illusions of treasure or loved ones. Lures victims into lava pits.
weaknesses: Illusions break if exposed to pure water
beasts.taming: Yonghon Jeok use prismatic lenses to distort its webs.

beasts.name: Quakehorn Rhino
beasts.description: A rhino with a Dragonsteel horn. Stampedes through clans to “test their strength.”
weaknesses: Horn gets stuck in Dragonbone Spires
beasts.taming: Challenge it to a headbutt contest (requires SSS-tier stamina).

beasts.name: Nightscale Siren
beasts.description: A humanoid dragon with a lyre made of its own ribs. Sings dirges that liquefy bones.
weaknesses: Silenced by louder noise (e.g., Tempest Clan’s thunder drums)
beasts.taming: Myeongwol Bu bribes it with forbidden sheet music.

beasts.name: Magmaflow Salamander
beasts.description: A small, fiery salamander that thrives in lava flows, its body radiating heat and light.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to water and extreme cold
beasts.taming: Offer it Firebloom Berries, which it finds irresistible.

beasts.name: Dustwing Sparrow
beasts.description: A tiny dragon resembling a sparrow, with wings that create dust storms as it flits about.
weaknesses: Easily captured in nets or jars
beasts.taming: Children collect them in Storm Lanterns, using sweet nectar as bait.

beasts.name: Tempest Leviathan
beasts.description: A fusion of hurricane and sea serpent, its body crackling with lightning and churning whirlpools. Haewang’s incarnate wrath.
weaknesses: Calmed by Mirae’s Tear (a relic hidden in the Trench of Whispers)
beasts.taming: OmniSummoner must bind it during the 'Eye of the Storm' using a Typhoon Conch.

beasts.name: Coral Warden
beasts.description: A sentient coral fortress housing symbiotic sea creatures. Its roots stretch across trenches, rebuilding reefs.
beasts.taming: Bada Hyeop druids perform Reef Communion rituals at dawn.

beasts.name: Drowned King
beasts.description: A skeletal warlord fused with barnacles and Haewang’s storm magic. Commands ghost ships from the Eternal Maelstrom.
weaknesses: Banished by sunlight reflected through the Pearl of the Depths
beasts.taming: Haejeok Yeoltan offer stolen souls to bargain for its fleet.

beasts.name: Luminescent Abyss
beasts.description: A jellyfish-like entity with bioluminescent tendrils that drain light from the surrounding ocean. Guards the Pearl of Equilibrium.
weaknesses: Lured to the surface by Moonfire Lanterns
beasts.taming: Wolseong priests sacrifice their sight to commune with it.

beasts.name: Riptide Wyrm
beasts.description: A serpentine predator that swims through shadows in water, dragging victims into the Trench of Whispers.
beasts.taming: Nine Shadows Syndicate binds it with chains forged from abyssal ore.

beasts.name: Thunderclap Ray
beasts.description: A manta ray with wings that crackle with thunder. Creates localized hurricanes to disorient prey.
beasts.taming: Tempest Clan riders snare it with Storm Nets woven from kelp.

beasts.name: Siren’s Lament
beasts.description: The ghost of a Bada Hyeop captain who failed Mirae. Her wails summon tidal waves of grief, drowning entire crews.
weaknesses: Laid to rest by recovering her lost trident from the Maelstrom
beasts.taming: Only appeased by a Dirge of Atonement sung in Pelagian.

beasts.name: Kelpfiend Hydra
beasts.description: A hydra with kelp for heads, each spewing acidic brine. Grows stronger in polluted waters.
beasts.taming: Suryeon Bimu druids pacify it with Saltwater Psalms.

beasts.name: Vortex Crab
beasts.description: A crab the size of a warship, its claws spin whirlpools to trap prey. Burrows under islands to destabilize them.
weaknesses: Flip it using Tidal Leverage (requires 10+ sailors)
beasts.taming: Haejeok Yeoltan use it to sabotage rival fleets.

beasts.name: Bioluminescent Kraken
beasts.description: A smaller kraken that mimics coral reefs to ambush ships. Glows to hypnotize sailors into walking overboard.
weaknesses: Blinded by its own light if mirrored
beasts.taming: Bada Hyeop use Prismatic Shields to reflect its glow.

beasts.name: Tidehunter Shark
beasts.description: A shark with Abyssal Ore teeth that cut through hulls. Hunts in packs during high tide.
beasts.taming: Blacksmiths bait them with Rustmetal to harvest their teeth.

beasts.name: Mangrove Colossus
beasts.description: A walking mangrove tree with roots that strangle ships. Home to venomous snakes and wasps.
beasts.taming: Untamable—entire islands avoid its migration paths.

beasts.name: Seabed Wisp
beasts.description: Glowing orbs that lead sailors to treasure… or traps. Manifestations of Mirae’s curiosity.
beasts.taming: Children coax them with seashell offerings.

beasts.name: Anemone Reaper
beasts.description: A humanoid crustacean with anemone tentacles. Paralyzes prey and dissolves them in acidic 'gardens.'
beasts.taming: Alchemists farm them for Neurotoxin Glands.

beasts.name: Saltspine Eel
beasts.description: An eel with razor-sharp salt crystals along its spine. Swims through hurricanes to shred ships.
beasts.taming: Haejeok Yeoltan grind its spines into Salt Blades.

beasts.name: Driftwood Phantom
beasts.description: Possessed ship debris that assembles into a skeletal figure. Haunts shipwrecks for eternity.
beasts.taming: Salvagers avoid wrecks marked with its symbol.

beasts.name: Foamspray Dolphin
beasts.description: Dolphins that shoot pressurized water jets. Playful but capricious—sink ships for fun.
beasts.taming: Fishermen trade Skyfin Tuna for safe passage.

beasts.name: Trenchling
beasts.description: Eel-like parasites that swarm from trenches. Eat through hulls and flesh in seconds.
beasts.taming: Untamable—sailors fear them as 'Haewang’s Teeth.'

beasts.name: Pearlscuttle Otter
beasts.description: Otters that collect pearls and defend them with dazzling flashes. Non-lethal but territorial.
beasts.taming: Pearl divers trade baubles for safe harvesting.

beasts.name: Tidepool Pixie
beasts.description: Tiny winged spirits that dance in tidepools. Heal minor wounds but gossip to seagulls.
beasts.taming: Children befriend them with seaweed bracelets.

beasts.name: Singularity Drake
beasts.description: A dragon with obsidian scales that warp light, its wingspan bends spacetime. Born from the Void Nexus, it devours islands to fuel its mass.
weaknesses: Collapses if lured into a Neutral Zone (zero-gravity area)
beasts.taming: OmniSummoner must outpace its event horizon using a Rift Skipper artifact.

beasts.name: Riftcrawler Colossus
beasts.description: A shifting amalgam of limbs, eyes, and wings from alternate realities. Oozes Void Essence, corrupting terrain into unstable rifts.
weaknesses: Banished by sealing its Anchor Rift with Starbinder tech
beasts.taming: Void Reavers inject it with Chaos Serum to force obedience (50% success).

beasts.name: Gravemaw Leviathan
beasts.description: A serpentine beast that swims through floating islands, its maw a swirling black hole. Drains matter to grow.
weaknesses: Distracted by Order Crystals (emits stabilizing frequencies)
beasts.taming: Starbinders trap it in a Gravity Cage powered by Rift Crystals.

beasts.name: Chaosforge Golem
beasts.description: A self-assembling golem of debris, machinery, and rift energy. Its form shifts mid-combat to exploit weaknesses.
weaknesses: Core exposed when hit with Magnetic Pulse Grenades
beasts.taming: Cheonmugun engineers implant Stabilizer Cores to control its mutations.

beasts.name: Phaseclaw Predator
beasts.description: A panther-like creature that phases through dimensions mid-leap. Claws rend spatial fabric, leaving temporary rifts.
weaknesses: Trapped in Dimensional Snares (Wolhwa moonstone tech)
beasts.taming: Myeongwol Bu assassins bait it with Rift-Meal (meat soaked in Void Essence).

beasts.name: Glitch Hydra
beasts.description: A three-headed serpent with pixelated scales. Each head exists in a different dimension, attacking from unpredictable angles.
weaknesses: All heads must be severed simultaneously with Void Swords
beasts.taming: Guryong Yumin shamans perform a Rift Unweaving ritual.

beasts.name: Vortex Reaper
beasts.description: A locust swarm that creates micro-black holes. Devours crops, structures, and unlucky victims in seconds.
weaknesses: Repelled by Sonic Dissonance Fields (Bungu tech)
beasts.taming: Untamable—farmers use Chaos Iron barriers to protect settlements.

beasts.name: Fracturefiend
beasts.description: A crystalline scorpion with shard-coated claws. Splits into smaller clones when struck.
weaknesses: Shatters if frozen then heated rapidly
beasts.taming: Suryeon Bimu druids pacify it with Harmonic Chimes.

beasts.name: Warpstalker Hound
beasts.description: Canine mutants with distorted limbs. Bites teleport chunks of flesh into rifts, leaving gaping wounds.
weaknesses: Stasis Collars block their rift energy
beasts.taming: Void Reavers tame packs using Rift-Gorged Meat.

beasts.name: Quantum Wisp
beasts.description: Sentient orbs of fractured light that exist in multiple places at once. Confuse and disorient with quantum echoes.
weaknesses: Collapses if all copies are destroyed within 3 seconds
beasts.taming: Guryong Yumin use Prismatic Lenses to capture one.

beasts.name: Gravspine Crab
beasts.description: Crabs with shells that amplify gravity. Crushes prey under 10x weight, then feasts on the pulp.
weaknesses: Flip it onto its back to disrupt its gravity field
beasts.taming: Salvagers use Anti-Grav Pulses to immobilize.

beasts.name: Echo Specter
beasts.description: A ghostly remnant of those lost to rifts. Replays their final moments as lethal holograms.
weaknesses: Laid to rest by completing their 'unfinished business'
beasts.taming: Resolve their personal rift-related tragedy.

beasts.name: Riftmite Swarm
beasts.description: Beetle-like pests that chew through Chaos Iron and spread rift corruption.
beasts.taming: Untamable—Starbinders purge them aggressively.

beasts.name: Shardwing Moth
beasts.description: Moths with glass-like wings that explode into razor shards when threatened.
beasts.taming: Collectors risk injury to harvest their glittering wings.

beasts.name: Flux Serpent
beasts.description: A snake that flickers in/out of reality. Steals small objects and hoards them in rifts.
beasts.taming: Thieves use them to smuggle goods.

beasts.name: Glitch Sprite
beasts.description: Tiny gremlins that short-circuit machinery and warp holograms.
beasts.taming: Engineers use them as chaotic 'debuggers.'

beasts.name: Voidpup
beasts.description: Dog-sized rift mutants with unstable bodies. Loyal if raised from 'eggs' (rift orbs).
beasts.taming: Feed Stabilized Void Essence to imprint.

beasts.name: Flickerfin
beasts.description: Fish that teleport between water droplets. Delicacy in Pyeonji, but hard to catch.
weaknesses: Caught in Steam Nets (vaporizes their escape routes)
beasts.taming: Chefs pay fortunes for fresh specimens.

beasts.name: Dustmite Drone
beasts.description: Tiny mites that feed on rift dust. Indicators of unstable zones.
beasts.taming: Collected in Vial Traps for study.

beasts.name: Pixelpuff
beasts.description: A harmless, pixelated fluffball that glitches cutely. Popular with children.
beasts.taming: Kids lure them with Glowberries.
